definition: existing in name only, a phrase that can function as the subject or object of a verb
details:
adjective
- existing in name only
= example: existing in name only
= synonyms: titular
- named
= synonyms: nominative
- insignificantly small
= synonyms: token, tokenish
- of, relating to, or characteristic of an amount that is not adjusted for inflation
= example: of, relating to, or characteristic of an amount that is not adjusted for inflation
- pertaining to a noun or to a word group that functions as a noun
= example: pertaining to a noun or to a word group that functions as a noun
- relating to or constituting or bearing or giving a name
= example: relating to or constituting or bearing or giving a name
noun
- a phrase that can function as the subject or object of a verb
= synonyms: noun phrase, nominal phrase
